definition: someone who attaches great importance to good looks (esp. in others)
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
the "good-looks club": people who attach great importance to a person's appearance (pun on 外貿協會|外贸协会 foreign trade association)
outsourcing/people who judge others by their looks (abbr. for 外貌協會|外貌协会[wai4 mao4 xie2 hui4])
Taiwan External Trade Development Council (TAITRA), abbr. for 中華民國對外貿易發展協會|中华民国对外贸易发展协会
attractiveness index (rating of how good-looking sb is)
to be smitten with sb/love-struck fool/starry-eyed infatuation
fujoshi (woman who likes mangas about male homosexual love)
lolicon or rorikon (Japanese loanword)/manga or anime genre depicting young girls in an erotic manner
"Mr Perfect" (i.e. tall, rich and handsome) (Internet slang)
